9518170782178310157.Text: My candy treats are tasty, they are!  And filled with special sugar and love!  They bring happiness!  Happiness to everyone on Solstheim!  That's what I do, you see!  I give out my special sugary treats and spread happiness throughout the land!  It's difficult work, but oh so very rewarding!  M'nashi certainly thought so.  Ahh, M'nashi, the dear lad....
